snippet.title: We Grew Up in War – What does a war look like through the eyes of a child? (Teaser 2)
snippet.description:
What does a war look like through the eyes of a child? Follow three interwoven stories of kids growing up in the midst of armed conflicts in Bosnia, Ukraine, and Syria. Based on real testimonies, this emotional narrative adventure reveals the power of child’s imagination.

Coming Q1 2026. Wishlist now at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3254380/We_Grew_Up_in_War/
